notes_translated.fr: Cet ensemble de donnees indique le pourcentage de toutes les admissions de detenus hommes et femmes faisant l'objet d'une alerte au Centre de detention d 'Ottawa-Carleton de l'exercice 2005-2006 a l'exercice 2017-2018. On compte quatre alertes a l'admission dans cet ensemble de donnees : * Alerte pour violence familiale * Alerte pour sante mentale * Alerte de groupe menaçant la securite * Alerte de toxicomanie Pour en savoir plus, consultez la page Groupe d'examen concernant le Centre de detention d'Ottawa-Carleton [analyse des tendances trimestrielles](http://www.mcscs.jus.gov.on.ca/french/Servicescorrectionnels/OCDCGroupedexamenconcernant%E2%80%93Analysedestendancestrimestrielles_fr.html). Volets connexes au present jeu de donnees : * [Admissions en detention au Centre de detention d'Ottawa-Carleton](/fr/dataset/ottawa-carleton-detention-centre-admissions-to-custody) * [Nombre de detenus quotidien moyen au Centre de detention d'Ottawa-Carleton](/fr/dataset/ottawa-carleton-detention-centre-average-daily-counts) * [Nombre de detenus dans les unites specialisees du Centre de detention d'Ottawa-Carleton](/fr/dataset/ottawa-carleton-detention-centre-utilization-rates) * [Taux d'utilisation du Centre de detention d'Ottawa-Carleton](/fr/dataset/ottawa-carleton-detention-centre-specialized-unit-hold-counts)
notes_translated.en: This dataset provides the percentage of all male and female inmate admissions to the Ottawa-Carleton Detention Centre with an alert covering fiscal years 2005-06 through to 2017-18. There are four admission alerts identified in this dataset: * Domestic violence alert * Mental health alert * Security threat group alert * Substance abuse alert For more information, please see the Ottawa-Carleton Detention Centre [Quarterly Trends Analysis](http://www.mcscs.jus.gov.on.ca/english/Corrections/OttawaCarletonDetentionCentreTaskForce/OCDCTaskForce%E2%80%93QuarterlyTrendsAnalysis.html). This dataset is related to the following: * [Ottawa-Carleton Detention Centre admissions to custody](/dataset/ottawa-carleton-detention-centre-admissions-to-custody) * [Ottawa-Carleton Detention Centre average daily counts](/dataset/ottawa-carleton-detention-centre-average-daily-counts) * [Ottawa-Carleton Detention Centre utilization rates](/dataset/ottawa-carleton-detention-centre-utilization-rates) * [Ottawa-Carleton Detention Centre specialized unit hold counts](/dataset/ottawa-carleton-detention-centre-specialized-unit-hold-counts)

notes: This dataset provides the percentage of all male and female inmate admissions to the Ottawa-Carleton Detention Centre with an alert covering fiscal years 2005-06 through to 2017-18. There are four admission alerts identified in this dataset: * Domestic violence alert * Mental health alert * Security threat group alert * Substance abuse alert For more information, please see the Ottawa-Carleton Detention Centre [Quarterly Trends Analysis](http://www.mcscs.jus.gov.on.ca/english/Corrections/OttawaCarletonDetentionCentreTaskForce/OCDCTaskForce%E2%80%93QuarterlyTrendsAnalysis.html). This dataset is related to the following: * [Ottawa-Carleton Detention Centre admissions to custody](/dataset/ottawa-carleton-detention-centre-admissions-to-custody) * [Ottawa-Carleton Detention Centre average daily counts](/dataset/ottawa-carleton-detention-centre-average-daily-counts) * [Ottawa-Carleton Detention Centre utilization rates](/dataset/ottawa-carleton-detention-centre-utilization-rates) * [Ottawa-Carleton Detention Centre specialized unit hold counts](/dataset/ottawa-carleton-detention-centre-specialized-unit-hold-counts)
